description: This file defines interfaces for process container management in the WPEFramework, including iterators for network interfaces, memory info, processor info, and container management classes with methods to control and query container state and properties.

classes.name: INetworkInterfaceIterator
classes.description: Interface for iterating network interfaces, providing methods to retrieve interface name, number of addresses, and specific address.

classes.name: IMemoryInfo
classes.description: Interface providing memory usage statistics for a container, including allocated, resident, and shared memory.

classes.name: IProcessorInfo
classes.description: Interface providing CPU usage details for a container, including total usage, per-core usage, and number of cores.

classes.name: IContainer
classes.description: Interface representing a container with methods to retrieve its ID, PID, memory and processor info, network interfaces, state, and control operations to start and stop the container.

methods.name: Container
methods.description: Creates a new container instance with specified ID, search paths, log path, and configuration.

methods.name: Logging
methods.description: Enables logging for the container framework with specified log path and options.

methods.name: Containers
methods.description: Retrieves an iterator over all container IDs.

methods.name: Get
methods.description: Retrieves a container by its ID; returns null if not found.

ctags.name: IContainerIterator
ctags.pattern: /^    class IContainerIterator : public Core::IIterator, public Core::IReferenceCounted {$/

ctags.name: INetworkInterfaceIterator
ctags.pattern: /^    class INetworkInterfaceIterator : public Core::IIterator,  public Core::IReferenceCounted  {$/
